predicate.note: Frames file for 'correct' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: very straightforward
example.text: Intel said it had corrected the problems and would start producing bugless chips next week.

example.name: targetless trace
example.text: The 1988 period was restated from net income of $8 million *trace* to correct an overstatement in the company's Boston Co. subsidiary.
example.arg: an overstatement in the company's Boston Co. subsidiary
